description: HTML source file for a web-based database visualizer interface, including styles, layout, and client-side scripting for fetching and displaying database information, tables, and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API endpoint and renders them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets UI components, and shows loading indicators.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database item in the sidebar and loads associated tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and renders them in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it in the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs an HTML table from data array and inserts it into the container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, long strings, and nulls with interactivity.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for longer strings or objects.
